content: the 2nd chain from the hook sc4 5 row 2 chain 1 turn sc5 5 row 3 chain 1 turn sc5 5 row 4 chain 1 sc3 c 1 sc5 chain 1 sc3 chain 1 sc5 16 row 5 sc16 around do not single_crochet into the chain stitches 16 row 6 sc16 around 16 row 7 sc16 around 16 time to add your eyes legs make four row 1 ch6 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet 4 5 row 2 chain 1 turn sc5 5 row 3 … row 6 chain 1 turn sc5 5 row 7 chain 2 turn dc5 5 row 8 chain 8 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook sc11 chain 8 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook sc6 sc12 total of 19 row 9 chain 1 turn sc19 19 row 10 … row 12 chain 1 turn sc19 19 row 13 chain 1 turn sc11 slip_stitch into the next stitch chain 2 dc5 17 row 14 chain 1 turn sc5 5 row 15 … row 18 chain 1 turn single_crochet 5 5 row 19 chain 2 turn dc5 5 row 20 chain 1 turn sc5 5 row 21 … row 24 chain 1 turn sc5 5 sew and stuff the same way as the head see photo reference on how to assemble
